column2: HS200 - 05BR Brand New House for Sale in Pannipitiya
column6: This newly built, beautiful three story house located in Pannipitya is the perfect home for any family. Completed with 5 spacious bedrooms, 3 bathrooms with hot water the house comes with an outdoor garden and parking space for 2 vehicles within the premises. The entire house is very well ventilated with plenty of natural light coming in to the house through wide windows. Balconies that run around the rooms and living room makes the atmosphere very relaxing. The surrounding area is very quiet and peace with safe neighbourhood. There are two spacious living areas on the first floor and the second floor. There is a maid's toilet, small back yard and a large balcony with a view of the surrounding area. Additionally, all interior in the house (pantry cupboards, stair case, and ceiling) is built from Mahogany-wood and the exterior from Jack-wood (Doors and windows). It has a 1000L water tank and AKEA toilet fittings in all bathrooms.

column2: Luxury house for sale in Mavittara, Piliyandala
column6: Solidly built two storied newly developed luxury house for sale in Piliyandala. Built on 10 Perches Land & approx 2,500 Sq Feet floor area. The house used all the highest quality materials to build, solid and wide brick walls, jack and teak timber, Rochelle and Lanka tiles, granite bench tops, Mahogany pantry cupboards. Nestled in a highly residential area yet adorned with peace and tranquillity and walking distance to both Maharagama and Kesbewa road and 2.5 km to the Piliyandala town, reach within minutes to Kesbewa-Piliyandala bypass and southern expressway. This fantastic luxury house boasts light, space and air offering prosperity, simplicity and peace for its residents. A perfect fit for families wanting to secure a modern yet simple quiet life, this extremely solid house offers hugely spacious 4 bedrooms, 2 high quality bathrooms ( one brand new), a servant quarters with a bathroom and a toilet, 1 store room, 2 large living rooms, a modern kitchen with mahogany cupboards and granite benchtops, a dining room with granite benchtop ( brand new) and mahogany cupboards (brand new), 3 balconies, teak staircase, and a back yard with separate washing and bathing facilities, both well and pipe born water, hot water system ( brand new), KTK brand ceiling fans. All timber in the house either jack and  teak. One existing garage, but an opportunity to build a double garage. The picturesque front garden is a wonderful setting for relaxation or entertaining with a metal swing for the kids to enjoy. The area presents a very good neighbourhood, professionals and educated people aspiring for quiet living.Inviting for simple, yet elegant living with low maintenance ensuring best value for money.Note :- Weekly garbage collection to the doorstep is available.
